snippet: Prosecutors said that they had filed murder charges against two men suspected of leading angry townspeople who buried alive a teenager they believed had raped and killed a woman.
abstract: Prosecutors in Bolivia file murder charges against two men suspected of leading angry townspeople who buried alive a teenager they believed had raped and killed a woman in country's southern highlands.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors said that they had filed murder charges against two men suspected of leading angry townspeople who buried alive a teenager they believed had raped and killed a woman.

headline.main: Bolivia: Suspect Buried Alive by Mob
headline.print_headline: Bolivia: Suspect Buried Alive by Mob
